subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Delwyn Young hit a three-run homer to lead the United States to a 5-1 victory over Japan at the 37th Baseball World Cup in Taipei, Taiwan. Young, who is in the Los Angeles Dodgers’ system, helped the United States improve to 3-1 and remain in the tournament.
